statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ 1 \\ -15 \\ 2 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -8 \\ 10 \\ -14 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
